about.title: AZ Machinery your reliable partner for loading technology
about.description: AZ Machinery is the leading manufacturer of loading equipment in Europe. We offer a comprehensive range of loading ramps, platforms, storage and attachment equipment to suit all requirements.
about.box1Title: Your specialist for individual charging solutions
about.box1Description: We offer you a comprehensive selection of loading solutions that we individually adapt to your needs. Whether loading ramps, platforms, storage or attachment equipment - we will find the perfect solution for you.
about.box2Title: Our products are manufactured in our own production in Europe
about.box2Description: We attach great importance to safety and efficiency so that you can load and unload your goods safely and efficiently.
about.box3Description: We deliver our products throughout Europe and offer a comprehensive service. Our experts will be happy to advise you and find the optimal solution for your needs.

contact.title: Regional contact
contact.subTitle: Personal advice and support
contact.address: 13 rue de la scierie - 66340 Palau de Cerdagne, France

testimonials.louiseSvensonText: Great Mobile Dock Ramp. We have 5 units of Az ramp model Prime WLO 8+. Delivered in Denmark only 10 days after ordering. The contact with Jérôme GUIGUET was very good; These ramps are very easy to use, good quality manufacturing. The logistics team themselves appreciate them a lot.
testimonials.brunoDreixText: Purchase of a ramp with a 100% guaranteed delivery time.The availability is a real plus. First-class commercial monitoring from order to delivery and the sales representative knows his products like the back of his hand.
testimonials.proFoodCenterText: We are very happy with the ramp we received. Very robust and manageable ramp. We were surprised by the speed of delivery (10 days between contacting us and receiving the ramp). Very professional company!
testimonials.vincentGirardetText: Buy a Prime XS ramp in galvanized version. Very nice material; robust and easy to use. Delivered in Switzerland only 10 days after our order, I am glad to have done business with this company! Vincent
testimonials.christell48Text: Excellent value for money. We chose the PRIME WLO8+ with railing in FULL GALVA version. Super practical, good quality. AZ MACHINERY even recovered our old Expresso ramp that was no longer standing. Material received by us in the manufacturer's truck 4 days after our order. Really good, thank you.
testimonials.mauroMartinText: I bought a new ramp from AZ MACHINERY, we chose the AZ RAMP EASY XL 10 T model, a very good loading ramp. We received it in our warehouse in Argentina in 30 days, good contact with the very friendly seller. This ramp is of very good quality and impeccable workmanship. We are very happy with our purchase.

cookiebanner.title: But first, cookies!
cookiebanner.description: We use cookies to remember your preferences, show you relevant content, and make your AZ Machinery experience smoother. By using AZ Machinery, you agree to our

manage.title: Cookie settings
manage.necessary_description: Essential cookies ensure basic website functions like navigation and security access.
manage.preferences_description: Preference cookies remember data affecting website behavior, like language or region.
manage.statistics_description: Statistics cookies anonymously collect data to help website owners understand visitor interactions.
manage.marketing_description: Marketing cookies track website visitors to display relevant, engaging ads, valuable for publishers and advertisers.

policybanner.title: Privacy Policy
policybanner.content_01: This Privacy Policy applies to the website verladerampenprofi.de, operated by AZ Machinery.
policybanner.company_contact_data: AZ MACHINERY FRANCE: 13 rue de la scierie - 66 340 PALAU DE CERDAGNE . France, Tel : (+33) 03 52 74 03 69, Company ID : 824 654 958 000 19, TVA : FR62 824 654 958
policybanner.content_02_01: We collect and use personal data only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website, our content and services, and to answer user inquiries.
policybanner.content_02_02: When you access our website, information is automatically stored in server log files, which your browser transmits to us. This data includes: (Browser type and version, Operating system used, Referrer URL (previously visited page), Hostname of the accessing computer (e.g., your IP address), Time of server request)
policybanner.content_02_02_addon: This data is not used to identify individuals, but only for statistical purposes to analyze and improve the use of our website.
policybanner.content_02_03: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files stored on your device by your browser. They help facilitate the use of our website and enable certain features. We use session cookies on our website. These cookies are automatically deleted when you close your browser. We use statistics cookies on our website. These cookies help us analyze and improve the use of our website. They collect anonymous data, such as the number of visitors, the pages visited, and the time spent on the website. You can disable cookies in your browser settings. However, please note that this may limit the functionality of our website.
policybanner.content_03: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless required by law or with your consent.
policybanner.content_04: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, or unauthorized disclosure.
policybanner.content_05: You have the right to access your stored personal data, to rectify inaccurate data, to delete your data, to restrict the processing of your data, to object to the processing of your data, and to data portability.
policybanner.content_06: Our website may contain links to other websites. This Privacy Policy applies only to our website. We have no control over how your data is collected and used on other websites. Please refer to the respective privacy policies of other websites.
policybanner.content_07: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. The update will be published on our website.

main.title: Explore Our Range of Loading Ramp Types
main.description: Discover a diverse selection of loading ramp types designed to meet your loading needs efficiently. From versatile mobile ramps to robust static ramps, find the perfect solution for seamless loading and unloading operations. Elevate your productivity with our high-quality ramp options. Shop now!

main.static_ramp_description: Discover durability with our robust static loading ramps.
main.station_ramp_description: Optimize efficiency with our stationary loading platform.
